com.microsoft.applicationinsights.internal

Class Sender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.applicationinsights.internal.Sender

  • public class Sender
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton class sends data to the endpoint.

      • onResponse

        protected java.lang.String onResponse(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection,
                                      int responseCode,
                                      java.lang.String payload,
                                      java.io.File fileToSend)
        Handler for the http response from the sender
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection containing a response
        responseCode - the response code from the connection
        payload - the payload which generated this response
        fileToSend - reference to the file we want to send
        Returns:
        null if the request was successful, the server response otherwise

      • onExpected

        protected void onExpected(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection,
                          java.lang.StringBuilder builder,
                          java.io.File fileToSend)
        Process the expected response. If {code:TelemetryChannelConfig.isDeveloperMode}, read the response and log it.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection containing a response
        builder - a string builder for storing the response
        fileToSend - reference to the file we sent

      • onUnexpected

        protected void onUnexpected(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection,
                            int responseCode,
                            java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection containing a response
        responseCode - the response code from the connection
        builder - a string builder for storing the response

      • onRecoverable

        protected void onRecoverable(java.lang.String payload,
                             java.io.File fileToSend)
        Writes the payload to disk if the response code indicates that the server or network caused the failure instead of the client.
        Parameters:
        payload - the payload which generated this response
        fileToSend - reference to the file we sent

      • getWriter

        protected java.io.Writer getWriter(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a writer from the connection stream (allows for test hooks into the write stream)
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to which the stream will be flushed
        Returns:
        a writer for the given connection stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown by GZIP (used in SDK 19+)
